bug.author: AT0Naka
bug.summary: [Bug] Is it works on AMD cpus?
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Installed using Anaconda. Run as ... Got Intel MKL FATAL ERROR: Cannot load mkl_intel_thread.dll.
error
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
Share what your terminal says when you run the script (as well as what you would expect). <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows
Installation type Conda
RAM available 16GB
Hardware spec Ryzen 5 2600
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>

comments.comment:
I haven't tried Anaconda, but the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-docker-image>Docker image</denchmark-link> worked fine on my machine. You could try that for now if you want to get it working quickly.
OS Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
Installation type Docker
RAM available 32GB
Hardware spec AMD Ryzen 9 3900x

Ran into the exact same issue on MacOS 10.15 with a Ryzen 3800x, would be awesome if theres a note in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/1.-Installation>installation section</denchmark-link> on that ^^
